name: Mash (s34nn)
description:
Mash was created by a Sem 4 Student in KDU for an assignment called "Mobile Game Development". Mash is a 3D endless survival game where player will have to kill the monster that is spawned each round. 

Player will start off with 3 lives at the beginning of each round. Tap on the gun to shoot. Player can only rotate using the Left arrow and Right arrow. The number of enemies killed and number of waves survived will be recorded and put into the leaderboard. Players can also buy items from the shop with the coins they earned. 

Ps. The upgrades will reset once you lost the round.
